com.compendium.ui.popups
Class UIBasePopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  com.compendium.ui.popups.UIBasePopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
UIBaseListPopupMenu, UIBaseMapPopupMenu, UIViewOutlinePopupMenu
public abstract class UIBasePopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class has generic building blocks for the right-click menu options for list, map and node right-click menus

Author:
Michelle Bachler
See Also:
Serialized Form
